Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property until 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 333 of the laws of 2006 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
